skills.desc: Combat Action: When your active character is Clorinde, equip this card. After Clorinde equips this card, immediately use Hunter's Vigil once. After you trigger Electro-Related Reactions, +1 to the next instance of DMG Clorinde deals this Round. (Up to 3 stacks, +3 DMG total) (You must have Clorinde in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
